text:
Arne Lyngstad (10 May 1962 – 30 May 2019) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Party. Lyngstad was born in Verdal. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Nord-Trøndelag in 1997. He retired in 2005.
Lyngstad died on 30 May 2019 from cancer in Trondheim, aged 57.
